alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 3:33AM EST until March 12 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 500 AM EST. * At 333 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Perry, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Pinland, Cooks Hammock, Jug Island, Chancey, Smith, Buckville, Carbur, Alton, Mayo Junction, Adams Beach, Townsend, Dekle Beach, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, San Pedro Junction and Day. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
